title: Dry Divas Designer Shower Cap - Washable, Reusable - Bouffant With Vintage Jeweled Brooch (Eiffel In Love With U)
features: Now you donâ€™t have to leave your swagger behind when you shower!
Made from the highest quality laminated cotton fabric that won't mold or mildew. The elastic stays put and keeps your hair 100% dry.
The longevity will blow your diva mind! Our shower caps last up to 2-3 years.
You spend so much money on your hair, why not take care of it with a high quality shower cap that won't smash your hair?
Dry Divas fashions each 22" Bouffant cap with a sparkly vintage jeweled brooch (Brooch and ribbon color may vary)
description: From the mind and inspiration of Colleen Bellitti, welcome to the world of "Dry Divas!" Dry Divas is a premium shower cap and bath products company specializing in hair care. Colleen is a skilled designer and salesperson who continues to create needed and beautiful beauty-related products which have been highlighted in magazines such as InStyle, Vogue Japan, Shape, InTouch, US, Bride, and others. Colleen worked for 21 years with a top investment management company, where she honed her business and sales skills. While working fulltime, Dry Divas began in Colleen's garage 11 years ago. As Dry Divas sales grew, Colleen made the difficult decision to leave her day job and focus on her beauty product line. Since then, Colleen's creative energy has expanded the business beyond shower caps to include towel wraps, spa bands, and cosmetic bags.
